summary: The log.error() method in workflow interceptors doesn't properly serialize Error objects, logging only the message and context fields while omitting all error properties like the stack trace.
userImpact: Developers cannot effectively debug workflow interceptors because Error objects lose their properties when logged, making it difficult to diagnose issues.
rootCause: The log.error() method does not properly handle Error object serialization, stripping error properties during logging.
keyQuote: all properties of `e` are missing from this log!
